page.title: 17GROSMONT GAMES 2
page.content: and cricket.We like to play 40-40 because there is a den exactly like the games rules say it should be like. This is how the game is played.One person is on it,he closes his eyes and counts to 40.When everyone has run away he goes to look for them,if he sees someone he races them to the den. If he gets there first they are out, but if he gets there last they are in. Also we have recently been playing Cricket. { Llewelyn says his favourite place {to play is :- } ".....in a thick hedge of trees and brambles.Through the hedge runs a stream running with the course of the hedge.To get to the den there are two ways.The easy way is down into the valley where the stream is and across a dam and up a muddy bank.The dam is a place which makes a deepish pool for
